channel.title: top on NewsStreet | News portal

item.title: Rishi Sunak, wife Akshata Murthy's combined fortune is double of UK's King Charles
item.description: Rishi Sunak, wife Akshata Murthy’s combined fortune is double of UK’s King Charles Rishi Sunak, who has become the UK's first ever Hindu Prime Minister, and wife Akshata Murthy, daughter of Indian billionaire NR Narayana Murthy, have a combined fortune of 730 million pounds, media reports claimed.

item.title: Chhat Puja 2022: Important dates from Arghya to Kharna
item.description: Chhat Puja 2022: Important dates from Arghya to Kharna During Chhat puja the Sun God and Chhati Mata are worshipped, and both men and women fast for 36 hours.

item.description: CAG set to conduct comprehensive audit of country’s health sector Current approach to be based in common parameters, goals and analysis, as opposed to earlier exercises done on the basis of some research or state-specific issues

item.title: Deepavali: Chennai police book 354 cases for violation of firecracker norms
item.description: Deepavali: Chennai police book 354 cases for violation of firecracker norms Most of the cases were booked for violations in the time stipulations given for bursting of firecrackers; a majority of the cases were in Mylapore, Washermenpet and Pulianthope, police said

item.title: Rishi Sunak to become Britain’s third PM of the year at meeting with King Charles III
item.description: Rishi Sunak to become Britain’s third PM of the year at meeting with King Charles III Liz Truss will depart after making a brief public statement, seven weeks to the day after she was appointed Prime Minister

item.title: Karnataka: Staff from government-aided schools, colleges demand pension. Threaten to go on hunger strike
item.description: Karnataka: Staff from government-aided schools, colleges demand pension. Threaten to go on hunger strike The President of the Pensionless Employees Association said that employees appointed after 2006 are getting pensions under either the Open or New Pension Schemes Members of the Pensionless Employees Association, who are in schools and colleges that are aided by the state government of Karnataka, have threatened to launch an indefinite hunger strike along with their family members at Freedom Park in Bengaluru if the Karnataka government does not announce pensions before December 19, stated a report by The New Indian Express.

item.title: UGC frames new guidelines on safety of women in educational institutions
item.description: UGC frames new guidelines on safety of women in educational institutions Suggestions and comments are invited by the commission till November 14; a committee set up by UGC to review and update safety guidelines

item.description: #WhatTheFAQ: Rishi Sunak is UK’s new PM. Here’s a look at the first Indian-origin PM’s journey The 42-year-old has his roots in India and is the husband of Akshata Murty, daughter of Infosys Founder NR Narayan Murty
